name: css-filter-blur
description: Css module of single purpose classes for filter blur

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-filter-blur.css > css/css-filter-blur.css && tachyons src/css-filter-blur.css --minify > css/css-filter-blur.min.css && tachyons src/css-filter-blur.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
